lore: Elise is a deadly predator who dwells in a shuttered, lightless palace, deep within the oldest city of Noxus. Once mortal, she was the mistress of a powerful house, but the bite of a vile demigod transformed her into something beautiful, yet utterly inhumanâ€”a spider-like creature, drawing unsuspecting prey into her web. To maintain her eternal youth, Elise now prefers to feed upon the naive and the faithless, and there are few who can resist her seductions.
title: the Spider Queen
blurb: Elise is a deadly predator who dwells in a shuttered, lightless palace, deep within the oldest city of Noxus. Once mortal, she was the mistress of a powerful house, but the bite of a vile demigod transformed her into something beautiful, yet utterly...
allytips: Spider Form is most effective at finishing off enemies with low health; Human Form's Neurotoxin does more damage to healthy foes.
When in Spider Form, Spiderlings will attack the target that Elise uses Venomous Bite on.
Elise's Spider Form and Spider Form abilities do not cost mana and can be prioritized when you are trying to conserve mana.

passive.name: Spider Queen
passive.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

enemytips: Elise's Spider Form is more dangerous when you are at low health, and her Human Form more potent when you are at high health.
Rappel will only move Elise straight up and down unless she can descend upon an enemy unit.
Rappel has a long cooldown. Elise is vulnerable after she has used it.
name: Elise

spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
spells.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is. Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
spells.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spells.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel
spells.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
spells.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

spells.name: Spider Form
spells.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spells.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes. Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.
